name: ABPeoplePickerView
desc: An object you use to customize the behavior of people-picker views in an app's user interface.

items.name: func addProperty(String!)
items.desc: Adds a property to the group of properties whose values are shown in the record list.

items.name: func columnTitle(forProperty: String!) -> String!
items.desc: Returns the title of a custom property.

items.name: var displayedProperty: String!
items.desc: The property currently displayed in the record list.

items.name: func properties() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of the properties whose values are shown in the record list.

items.name: func removeProperty(String!)
items.desc: Removes a property from the group of properties whose values are shown in the record list.

items.name: func setColumnTitle(String!, forProperty: String!)
items.desc: Sets the title displayed in the people picker for a property.

items.name: var valueSelectionBehavior: ABPeoplePickerSelectionBehavior
items.desc: The current selection behavior.

items.name: struct ABPeoplePickerSelectionBehavior
items.desc: Constants indicating the possible value selection behaviors.

items.name: var allowsGroupSelection: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the user can select entire groups in the group column.

items.name: var allowsMultipleSelection: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether multiple groups, records, or values of multivalue properties can be selected at a time.

items.name: func deselectAll(Any!)
items.desc: Deselects all selected groups, records, and values in multivalue properties.

items.name: func deselect(ABGroup!)
items.desc: Deselects a group selected in the group list.

items.name: func deselectIdentifier(String!, for: ABPerson!)
items.desc: Deselects a value selected in a multivalue property.

items.name: func deselect(ABRecord!)
items.desc: Deselects a record selected in the record list.

items.name: var selectedGroups: [Any]!
items.desc: The groups selected in the group list. (read-only)

items.name: func selectedIdentifiers(for: ABPerson!) -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns the identifiers of the selected values in a multivalue property.

items.name: var selectedRecords: [Any]!
items.desc: The selection in the records list. (read-only)

items.name: func selectedValues() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of all the values selected in the displayed multivalue property.

items.name: func select(ABGroup!, byExtendingSelection: Bool)
items.desc: Selects a group or a set of groups in the group list.

items.name: func selectIdentifier(String!, for: ABPerson!, byExtendingSelection: Bool)
items.desc: Selects a value or a set of values in a multivalue property.

items.name: func select(ABRecord!, byExtendingSelection: Bool)
items.desc: Selects a record or a set of records in the record list.

items.name: var accessoryView: NSView!
items.desc: The view that is placed to the left of the search field.

items.name: func clearSearchField(Any!)
items.desc: Clears the search field and resets the list of displayed records.

items.name: func editInAddressBook(Any!)
items.desc: Launches Address Book to edit the item selected in the people picker.

items.name: var groupDoubleAction: Selector!
items.desc: The action to be invoked when a group is double-clicked.

items.name: var nameDoubleAction: Selector!
items.desc: The action to be invoked when a name is double-clicked.

items.name: func selectInAddressBook(Any!)
items.desc: Launches Address Book and selects the item selected in the people picker.

items.name: var target: AnyObject!
items.desc: The target for double-click actions.

items.name: var autosaveName: String!
items.desc: The name under which the column positions and the filter selection are saved.

items.name: static let ABPeoplePickerGroupSelectionDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the selection in the group list is changed.

items.name: static let ABPeoplePickerNameSelectionDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the selection in the name list is changed.

items.name: static let ABPeoplePickerValueSelectionDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the selection in a multivalue property is changed.

items.name: static let ABPeoplePickerDisplayedPropertyDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the displayed property in the record list is changed.
